titleStmt.title: A plaine and compendious exposition of Christs Sermon in the Mount contayned in the 5.6.7. chapters of Saint Matthew. Being the substance of sundry sermons. By Iohn Carter minister at Belstead neare Ipswych
titleStmt.author: Carter, John, 1554-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. S[tansby] for Samuel Man dvvelling in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Svvanne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Christs Sermon in the Mount expounded.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Svvanne
